text: Abbas Afridi (born 5 April 2001) is a Pakistani cricketer. He made his List A debut for Habib Bank Limited in the 2018–19 Quaid-e-Azam One Day Cup on 6 September 2018. He made his first-class debut for Habib Bank Limited in the 2018–19 Quaid-e-Azam Trophy on 3 October 2018. In December 2019, he was named in Pakistan's squad for the 2020 Under-19 Cricket World Cup. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:Pakistani cricketers Category:Habib Bank Limited cricketers Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Abbas Afridi
